summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the functionality of the Adafactor optimizer, covering gradient clipping mechanisms, configuration handling, numerical accuracy against reference values, single‑step updates in both one‑dimensional and two‑dimensional scenarios, and the correct application of weight decay.
business_intent: Provide confidence that the Adafactor optimizer works reliably in production machine‑learning pipelines, reducing risk of training instability and ensuring accurate model convergence.
